casebody.data:
STATE
v.
COPLEY 195P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 23, 2019 Marilyn G. Ozer, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Copley, Chad Cameron. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

*308The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of May 2019 by the State for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd of May 2019."
